remarks: Version of ~ peano5 when ` _om i^i A ` is assumed to be a set, allowing a proof from the core axioms of CZF. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Nov-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
peano5set $p |- ( ( _om i^i A ) e. V -> ( ( (/) e. A /\ A. x e. _om ( x e. A -> suc x e. A ) ) -> _om C_ A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
